title: Tina Malone splits from toyboy husband Paul Chase after nine years of marriage

Tina Malone has announced she's split from her husband after nine years of marriage.

The Shameless actress, 56, confirmed the news that she'd called it a day with toyboy Paul Chase, 37, on Twitter .

They have been together for eleven years and tied the knot in 2010, welcoming daughter Flame in 2013 when Tina was 50.

She sad it was "with great sadness" that she made the announcement in a single tweet.

Tina tweeted: "With great sadness I wrote this myself and Paul have split up after 11 yrs together!"

Her fans rushed to send her messages of support in the replies to the tweet.

(Image: UK Press via Getty Images)

The sad news comes after Tina's self-described "year from hell".

She admitted that she suffered from suicidal thoughts and even wrote a suicide note.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

Tina suffered plenty of hardships during this period, including when Paul lost his job and they lost their home.

Tina also fell out with her eldest daughter Danielle, 37, and ended up in court after she shared a picture that allegedly showed one of James Bulger's killers as a grown up.

She told the Daily Star : "It's been the year from hell. I was suffering with severe depression and I was suicidal.

(Image: Roland Leon/Sunday Mirror)

"I'd penned my letters and planned how I'd do it, but the only thing that stopped me was Flame."

Tina says she now feels like her life has turned around.

She added: "I'm back in work now on Channel 5 show Clink, Paul is back in full-time work and my relationship with Danielle is back on track."
